languages.text: "И нам... нам удалось найти часть детей Крудараха. Найти и засвидетельствовать их ужасающую судьбу". {n}Ирлиэт прикрывает глаза.{/n} "Мне кажется, что каждый мой шаг, сделанный навстречу судьбе Крудараха, несет лишь погибель моим братьям и сестрам. И все же... не останавливайся, прошу тебя. С каждым циклом те, кого еще скрывает мгла космоса, все ближе к гибели... и безвестности. Из всех мон-кай, кого я встречала... мне казалось... что ты — ты, элантах — в силах понять меня и мою боль".
languages.translation_comment:
помог немного
Если зафинален хоть один из add_AeldariInTrouble_1 / 2 / 3

languages.text: "And we... we have managed to find some of the children of Crudarach. Find and bear witness to their horrifying fate." {n}Yrliet half-closes her eyes.{/n} "I think that every step I take to discover Crudarach's fate brings nothing but doom to my brothers and sisters. And still... I ask you not to stop. With every cycle, those still hidden in the darkness of the cosmos draw closer to their demise... and obscurity. Out of all the mon-keigh I have met... I thought... that you — you, elantach — might be able to understand me and my pain."
languages.original_text: "И нам... нам удалось найти часть детей Крудараха. Найти и засвидетельствовать их ужасающую судьбу". {n}Ирлиэт прикрывает глаза.{/n} "Мне кажется, что каждый мой шаг, сделанный навстречу судьбе Крудараха, несет лишь погибель моим братьям и сестрам. И все же... не останавливайся, прошу тебя. С каждым циклом те, кого еще скрывает мгла космоса, все ближе к гибели... и безвестности. Из всех мон-кай, кого я встречала... мне казалось... что ты — ты, элантах — в силах понять меня и мою боль".

languages.text: “我们……我们想办法找到了一部分克鲁达拉赫的子嗣。我们找到了他们，亲眼见证了他们悲惨的命运。”{n}伊莉耶特半闭着眼睛。{/n}“我想，我为探索克鲁达拉赫踏出的每一步，都只会给我的兄弟姐妹带来无尽的厄运。但是……我请你不要停下。每次轮回过后，那些潜藏在黑暗宇宙中的邪恶就越来越接近它们的覆亡与湮灭。在我所遇到的所有猴子中……我曾以为，你，外界人，可能理解我和我的痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "And we... we have managed to find some of the children of Crudarach. Find and bear witness to their horrifying fate." {n}Yrliet half-closes her eyes.{/n} "I think that every step I take to discover Crudarach's fate brings nothing but doom to my brothers and sisters. And still... I ask you not to stop. With every cycle, those still hidden in the darkness of the cosmos draw closer to their demise... and obscurity. Out of all the mon-keigh I have met... I thought... that you — you, elantach — might be able to understand me and my pain."

traits.locale_text: “我们……我们想办法找到了一部分克鲁达拉赫的子嗣。我们找到了他们，亲眼见证了他们悲惨的命运。”{n}伊莉耶特半闭着眼睛。{/n}“我想，我为探索克鲁达拉赫踏出的每一步，都只会给我的兄弟姐妹带来无尽的厄运。但是……我请你不要停下。每次轮回过后，那些潜藏在黑暗宇宙中的邪恶就越来越接近它们的覆亡与湮灭。在我所遇到的所有猴子中……我曾以为，你，外界人，可能理解我和我的痛苦。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Y nosotros... logramos encontrar a varios de los hijos de Crudarach. Los encontramos y fuimos testigos de su espantoso destino». {n}Yrliet entorna los ojos.{/n} «Creo que cada paso que doy para descubrir el sino de Crudarach no aporta más que calamidades para mis hermanos y hermanas. Y pese a ello... te pido que no desistas. Con cada ciclo que pasa, los que continúan perdidos en las tinieblas del cosmos están cada vez más cerca de la muerte... y el olvido. De todos los mon-keigh que he conocido... creí... que tú, elantach, quizá fueras capaz de entender mi dolor y a mí misma».
languages.original_text: "And we... we have managed to find some of the children of Crudarach. Find and bear witness to their horrifying fate." {n}Yrliet half-closes her eyes.{/n} "I think that every step I take to discover Crudarach's fate brings nothing but doom to my brothers and sisters. And still... I ask you not to stop. With every cycle, those still hidden in the darkness of the cosmos draw closer to their demise... and obscurity. Out of all the mon-keigh I have met... I thought... that you — you, elantach — might be able to understand me and my pain."

traits.locale_text: «Y nosotros... logramos encontrar a varios de los hijos de Crudarach. Los encontramos y fuimos testigos de su espantoso destino». {n}Yrliet entorna los ojos.{/n} «Creo que cada paso que doy para descubrir el sino de Crudarach no aporta más que calamidades para mis hermanos y hermanas. Y pese a ello... te pido que no desistas. Con cada ciclo que pasa, los que continúan perdidos en las tinieblas del cosmos están cada vez más cerca de la muerte... y el olvido. De todos los mon-keigh que he conocido... creí... que tú, elantach, quizá fueras capaz de entender mi dolor y a mí misma».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Et nous... avons réussi à retrouver certains enfants de Crudarach, juste à temps pour être témoins de leur horrible destin, {n}dit-elle, puis elle ferme les yeux à moitié.{/n} Je pense que chaque pas que je fais pour découvrir ce qui est arrivé à Crudarach ne fait que déchaîner le chaos sur mes frères et mes sœurs. Et pourtant... je vous demande de continuer. Chaque cycle qui passe rapproche de la mort ceux qui se dissimulent dans l'obscurité du cosmos. Parmi tous les mon-keigh que j'ai rencontrés... je pensais que vous, elantach, seriez en mesure de comprendre ma peine. »
languages.original_text: "And we... we have managed to find some of the children of Crudarach. Find and bear witness to their horrifying fate." {n}Yrliet half-closes her eyes.{/n} "I think that every step I take to discover Crudarach's fate brings nothing but doom to my brothers and sisters. And still... I ask you not to stop. With every cycle, those still hidden in the darkness of the cosmos draw closer to their demise... and obscurity. Out of all the mon-keigh I have met... I thought... that you — you, elantach — might be able to understand me and my pain."

traits.locale_text: « Et nous... avons réussi à retrouver certains enfants de Crudarach, juste à temps pour être témoins de leur horrible destin, {n}dit-elle, puis elle ferme les yeux à moitié.{/n} Je pense que chaque pas que je fais pour découvrir ce qui est arrivé à Crudarach ne fait que déchaîner le chaos sur mes frères et mes sœurs. Et pourtant... je vous demande de continuer. Chaque cycle qui passe rapproche de la mort ceux qui se dissimulent dans l'obscurité du cosmos. Parmi tous les mon-keigh que j'ai rencontrés... je pensais que vous, elantach, seriez en mesure de comprendre ma peine. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Und wir ... wir haben einige der Kinder von Crudarach gefunden. Und wurden Zeugen ihres furchtbaren Schicksals." {n}Yrliet schließt halb die Augen.{/n} "Ich glaube, jeder Schritt, um das Schicksal von Crudarach aufzudecken, bringt meinen Brüdern und Schwestern nur Leid. Und dennoch ... bitte ich Euch, nicht aufzuhören. Mit jedem Zyklus nähern sich jene, die noch in der Dunkelheit des Kosmos versteckt sind, ihrem Niedergang ... und der Obskurität. Von allen Chem-Pan-Sey, die mir begegne sind ... dachte ich ... dass Ihr – Ihr, Elantach – mich und meinen Schmerz verstehen könntet."
languages.original_text: "And we... we have managed to find some of the children of Crudarach. Find and bear witness to their horrifying fate." {n}Yrliet half-closes her eyes.{/n} "I think that every step I take to discover Crudarach's fate brings nothing but doom to my brothers and sisters. And still... I ask you not to stop. With every cycle, those still hidden in the darkness of the cosmos draw closer to their demise... and obscurity. Out of all the mon-keigh I have met... I thought... that you — you, elantach — might be able to understand me and my pain."

traits.locale_text: "Und wir ... wir haben einige der Kinder von Crudarach gefunden. Und wurden Zeugen ihres furchtbaren Schicksals." {n}Yrliet schließt halb die Augen.{/n} "Ich glaube, jeder Schritt, um das Schicksal von Crudarach aufzudecken, bringt meinen Brüdern und Schwestern nur Leid. Und dennoch ... bitte ich Euch, nicht aufzuhören. Mit jedem Zyklus nähern sich jene, die noch in der Dunkelheit des Kosmos versteckt sind, ihrem Niedergang ... und der Obskurität. Von allen Chem-Pan-Sey, die mir begegne sind ... dachte ich ... dass Ihr – Ihr, Elantach – mich und meinen Schmerz verstehen könntet."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「そして…クルダラの子供たちの何人かを見つけることはできた。その恐ろしい運命を探り、目撃した」{n}ユリエットは半ば目を閉じている。{/n}「クルダラの運命を知るために我が辿るその歩みは、兄弟姉妹に破滅しかもたらさないのだろう。それでも…止めないでほしい。サイクルを重ねるごとに、宇宙の闇に隠れている者たちは終焉へと近づき…そして暗黒に包まれてゆく。我が出会ったモン＝ケイの中で…お前なら、エランタ…我とこの苦しみを理解してくれるかもしれないと思ったのだ」
languages.original_text: "And we... we have managed to find some of the children of Crudarach. Find and bear witness to their horrifying fate." {n}Yrliet half-closes her eyes.{/n} "I think that every step I take to discover Crudarach's fate brings nothing but doom to my brothers and sisters. And still... I ask you not to stop. With every cycle, those still hidden in the darkness of the cosmos draw closer to their demise... and obscurity. Out of all the mon-keigh I have met... I thought... that you — you, elantach — might be able to understand me and my pain."

traits.locale_text: 「そして…クルダラの子供たちの何人かを見つけることはできた。その恐ろしい運命を探り、目撃した」{n}ユリエットは半ば目を閉じている。{/n}「クルダラの運命を知るために我が辿るその歩みは、兄弟姉妹に破滅しかもたらさないのだろう。それでも…止めないでほしい。サイクルを重ねるごとに、宇宙の闇に隠れている者たちは終焉へと近づき…そして暗黒に包まれてゆく。我が出会ったモン＝ケイの中で…お前なら、エランタ…我とこの苦しみを理解してくれるかもしれないと思ったのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Crudarach'ın çocuklarından bazılarını bulmayı başardık. Bulduk ve korkunç kaderlerine şahit olduk." {n}Yrliet gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Crudarach'ın kaderini öğrenmek için attığım her adım, kardeşlerime felaketi getirmekten başka bir işe yaramıyor. Yine de... Durmamanı rica ediyorum. Her bir döngüyle kozmosun karanlığında gizlenenler, sonlarına ve bilinmezliğe biraz daha yaklaşacak. Tanıştığımız tüm mon-keighler arasında... Senin... Senin, elantach... Beni ve acılarımı anlayabileceğini düşünüyorum."
languages.original_text: "And we... we have managed to find some of the children of Crudarach. Find and bear witness to their horrifying fate." {n}Yrliet half-closes her eyes.{/n} "I think that every step I take to discover Crudarach's fate brings nothing but doom to my brothers and sisters. And still... I ask you not to stop. With every cycle, those still hidden in the darkness of the cosmos draw closer to their demise... and obscurity. Out of all the mon-keigh I have met... I thought... that you — you, elantach — might be able to understand me and my pain."

traits.locale_text: "Crudarach'ın çocuklarından bazılarını bulmayı başardık. Bulduk ve korkunç kaderlerine şahit olduk." {n}Yrliet gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Crudarach'ın kaderini öğrenmek için attığım her adım kardeşlerime felaketi getirmekten başka bir işe yaramıyor. Yine de... Durmamanı rica ediyorum. Her bir döngüyle kozmosun karanlığında gizlenenler sonlarına ve bilinmezliğe biraz daha yaklaşacak. Tanıştığımız tüm mon-keighler arasında... Senin... Senin, elantach... Beni ve acılarımı anlayabileceğini düşünüyorum."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
